languages.text: В инвентаре появился расходный предмет снаряжения! Гранаты, стимуляторы, медкомплекты и другие расходные предметы можно размещать в ячейках быстрого доступа — дважды кликните [ЛКМ] на предмете или зажмите [ЛКМ] на предмете и перетащите его в подсвеченную ячейку. Каждый расходный предмет обладает определенным количеством применений — оно указано в описании. Как и другие действия в бою, использование расходных предметов отнимает очки действий.

You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
languages.original_text: В инвентаре появился расходный предмет снаряжения! Гранаты, стимуляторы, медкомплекты и другие расходные предметы можно размещать в ячейках быстрого доступа — дважды кликните [ЛКМ] на предмете или зажмите [ЛКМ] на предмете и перетащите его в подсвеченную ячейку. Каждый расходный предмет обладает определенным количеством применений — оно указано в описании. Как и другие действия в бою, использование расходных предметов отнимает очки действий.

traits.locale_text:
You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

languages.text:
您找到了一件消耗品！
手雷、兴奋剂、医疗包，以及其他消耗品都可以放在快速访问栏位中。若要将消耗品装备在快速访问栏中，只要双击鼠标左键，或按住鼠标左键将目标物品拖拽至物品栏即可。每件消耗品的使用次数都是有限的，使用次数会在物品说明中标明。
与战斗中的绝大多数行动类似，使用消耗品会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
您找到了一件消耗品！
手雷、兴奋剂、医疗包，以及其他消耗品都可以放在快速访问栏位中。若要将消耗品装备在快速访问栏中，只要双击鼠标左键，或按住鼠标左键将目标物品拖拽至物品栏即可。每件消耗品的使用次数都是有限的，使用次数会在物品说明中标明。
与战斗中的绝大多数行动类似，使用消耗品会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
消耗品を見つけた！
グレネード、増強剤、メディキット、その他の消耗品はクイックアクセススロットに置くことができる。アイテムの上で [LMB] をダブルクリックするか、[LMB] を押した状態でハイライト表示されるスロットにドラッグしてみよう。各消耗品には一定の使用回数があり、その回数はアイテムの説明欄に記載されている。
戦闘中のほとんどの行動と同様、消耗品を使用するとキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}が消費される。
languages.original_text:
You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
消耗品を見つけた！
グレネード、増強剤、メディキット、その他の消耗品はクイックアクセススロットに置くことができる。アイテムの上で [LMB] をダブルクリックするか、[LMB] を押した状態でハイライト表示されるスロットにドラッグしてみよう。各消耗品には一定の使用回数があり、それはアイテムの説明に記載されている。
戦闘中のほとんどのアクションと同様、消耗品を使用するとキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}が消費される。

languages.text:
¡Has encontrado un objeto consumible!
Las granadas, los estimulantes, los botiquines y demás consumibles pueden colocarse en ranuras de acceso rápido. Para hacerlo, haz doble clic en este objeto con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] o arrástralo a la ranura resaltada manteniendo el [botón izquierdo del ratón] Cada objeto consumible tiene un número de usos específico que viene indicado en su descripción.
Al igual que la mayoría de las acciones en combate, el uso de objetos consumibles conlleva un gasto de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.
languages.original_text:
You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
¡Has encontrado un objeto consumible!
Las granadas, los estimulantes, los botiquines y demás consumibles pueden colocarse en ranuras de acceso rápido. Para hacerlo, haz doble clic en este objeto con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] o arrástralo a la ranura resaltada manteniendo el [botón izquierdo del ratón] Cada objeto consumible tiene un número de usos específico que viene indicado en su descripción.
Al igual que la mayoría de las acciones en combate, el uso de objetos consumibles conlleva un gasto de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.

languages.text:
Du hast einen Verbrauchsgegenstand gefunden!
Granaten, Stimulanzien, Medikits und andere Verbrauchsgegenstände können in Schnellzugriffsslots platziert werden. Dazu doppelklickst du mit [LMB] auf einen solchen Gegenstand oder ziehst ihn mit gedrückter [LMB] auf einen hervorgehobenen Slot. Jeder Verbrauchsgegenstand hat eine bestimmte Anzahl von Verwendungsmöglichkeiten, die in der Beschreibung des Gegenstandes angegeben ist.
Wie bei den meisten Aktionen im Kampf verbraucht die Verwendung von verbrauchbaren Gegenständen die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} des Charakters.
languages.original_text:
You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast einen Verbrauchsgegenstand gefunden!
Granaten, Stimulanzien, Medikits und andere Verbrauchsgegenstände können in Schnellzugriffsslots platziert werden. Dazu doppelklickst du mit der [LMB] auf einen solchen Gegenstand oder ziehst ihn mit gedrückter [LMB] auf einen hervorgehobenen Slot. Jeder Verbrauchsgegenstand hat eine bestimmte Anzahl von Verwendungsmöglichkeiten, die in der Beschreibung des Gegenstandes angegeben ist.
Wie bei den meisten Aktionen im Kampf verbraucht die Verwendung von verbrauchbaren Gegenständen die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} des Charakters.

languages.text:
Vous avez trouvé un objet consommable !
Les grenades, stimulants, médikits et autres consommables peuvent être placés dans des emplacements à accès rapide. Pour ce faire, double-cliquez avec le [BGS] sur le type d'objet voulu ou faites-le glisser vers un emplacement mis en évidence tout en maintenant le [BGS] enfoncé. Chaque objet consommable est doté d'un certain nombre d'utilisations, indiqué dans la description correspondante.
Comme pour la plupart des actions de combat, l'utilisation d'objets consommables coûte des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}.
languages.original_text:
You have found a consumable item!
Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

languages.text:
Bir sarf eşya buldun!
Bombalar, uyarıcılar, sıhhiye çantaları ve diğer sarf eşyalar hızlı erişim yuvalarına yerleştirilebilir. Bunun için böyle bir eşyaya sol fare tuşuyla çift tıkla veya sol fare tuşunu basılı tutarak eşyayı vurgulu bir yuvaya sürükle. Her sarf eşyanın belirli bir kullanım adedi bulunur, bu da eşyanın açıklamasında belirtilir.
Çatışma esnasındaki çoğu eylemde olduğu gibi, sarf eşya kullanmak da karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanlarından{/g} harcar.
languages.original_text:

Grenades, stimulants, medikits, and other consumables can be placed in quick access slots. To do this, double-click on such an item [LMB] or drag it to a highlighted slot by holding [LMB]. Each consumable item has a certain number of uses, which is indicated in the item's description.
As with most actions in combat, using consumable items spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
